name: SKY_FLY
description:
SKY_FLY

Game for :

LOWREZJAM 2020

LOWREZJAM 2020 IS A RETRO SPACE SHOOTER, WITH MANY CHALLENGES TO WIN THE TERRIBLE INVASION OF THE PLANET.

ARROW KEYS = MOVE PRESS SPACE OR CLICK THE SHOOT BUTTON. 

PRESS X OR CLICK THE BUTTON FOR SPECIAL ACTIVE.

 

Music Credits: "Free Royalites Sounds"
